content.rendered: The bridge connecting Russia and Estonia suddenly plunges into darkness. When the light comes on again, in the middle of the bridge, on the conditional boundary line, a body is detected. A joint Russian-Estonian investigation is appointed. The Russian side is represented by investigator Maxim Kazantsev, and the Estonian side is represented by inspector Inga Veermaa. Together, they will investigate a chain of crimes that are well prepared, masterly executed and contain “messages” to society on the topic of social injustice.

excerpt.rendered: “The Red Army is advancing from the east, Allied troops are advancing from the West. A small town on the banks of the river and a bridge stretching across it.”
